Type.Name: Thread

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Thread extends System.Object

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Init() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes GLib thread awareness. This must be called before GLib's thread safety features are used. Initializing GLib thread awareness more than once causes undefined behaviour and must be avoided by checking to see if it has already been done with .
Checks to see if GLib thread support has been initialized with .
